settings.content:
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about sizing, need help with your order, or just want to chat about our latest collections, our friendly team is here to assist.

Email Us: concierge@calexico.com.au
For any inquiries, please send us an email, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. Our concierge team is dedicated to providing personalised service, whether you're shopping online or in-store.

Call Us: (07) 3252 8216 or 0428 039 663
Prefer to speak to someone directly? Give us a call during our store hours, and we’ll be happy to help.

Visit Us In Store

Our boutique is located in the heart of James Street, Brisbane, a hub of luxury shopping and dining. Come visit us to explore our curated selection of international designer pieces and enjoy a personalised styling session.

Calexico
Shop 7 / 46 James Street
Fortitude Valley QLD 4006
Australia

Mon-Wed: 9:30am - 5:00pm

Thu-Fri: 9:30am - 6:00pm

Sat: 9:30am - 5:00pm

Sun: 10:00am - 4:00pm
